title: 刚刚无聊做了一个仿真Herobrine~
txt_content:
本帖最后由 940755868 于 2014-7-15 11:09 编辑 

[attach]568784[/attach]哈哈我是用nbtedit修改好后，再用mcedit把生物变成命令方块summon指令的~
献上指令~
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {Attributes: [{Base: 20.0,Name: generic.maxHealth},{Base: 0.0,Modifiers: [{UUIDMost: -488183842148824195L,UUIDLeast: -6713320137934766063L,Amount: 0.009928618422664836,Operation: 0,Name: Random spawn bonus}],Name: generic.knockbackResistance},{Base: 0.23000000417232513,Name: generic.movementSpeed},{Base: 40.0,Modifiers: [{UUIDMost: 7678099749080223430L,UUIDLeast: -8278725866552710738L,Amount: 0.03918579778147113,Operation: 1,Name: Random spawn bonus}],Name: generic.followRange},{Base: 3.0,Name: generic.attackDamage},{Base: 0.0336565121982762,Name: zombie.spawnReinforcements}],Invulnerable: 0,PortalCooldown: 0,AbsorptionAmount: 0.0,FallDistance: 0.0,DeathTime: 0,DropChances: [2.0,2.0,2.0,2.0,2.0],PersistenceRequired: 1,id: Zombie,HealF: 19.691198348999023,ConversionTime: -1,Motion: [0.0,-0.0784000015258789,0.0],Leashed: 0,UUIDLeast: -5747984416415740951L,Health: 20,Air: 300,OnGround: 1,Dimension: 0,Rotation: [96.79180145263672,-1.85007905960083],UUIDMost: 5890216366633667075L,Equipment: [{id: 276,Count: 1,tag: {ench: [{lvl: 32767,id: 16}]},Damage: 0},{id: 313,Count: 1,tag: {ench: [{lvl: 32767,id: 0}]},Damage: 0},{id: 312,Count: 1,tag: {ench: [{lvl: 32767,id: 0}]},Damage: 0},{id: 311,Count: 1,tag: {ench: [{lvl: 32767,id: 0}]},Damage: 0},{id: 397,Count: 1,tag: {SkullOwner: MHF_Herobrine},Damage: 3}],CustomName: Herobrine,Pos: [-174.63548009717036,56.0,81.30000001192093],CanBreakDoors: 0,Fire: -1,CanPickUpLoot: 1,HurtTime: 0,AttackTime: 0,ActiveEffects: [{Ambient: 0,Duration: 999996756,Id: 14,Amplifier: 0}],CustomNameVisible: 0}复制代码


我和我的小伙伴都惊呆了！这么长！
其实有很多都是没有用的~用mcedit的滤器转成summon命令就是这么长
要在1.7版本使用哦~
这个仿真Herobrine其实就是隐身的僵尸穿上了逆天的附魔装备
手上拿着是锋利32767级的剑
穿的是保护32767级的衣服
被它摸一下你就会死惹~
你会看到“XXX被Herobrine杀死了”
